query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS conversions; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS formattingRules; CREATE TABLE conversions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  formattingRuleId INT,
  markdownTitle VARCHAR(255),
  markdownSize INT,
  pdfUrl LONGTEXT,
  pdfSize INT,
  generationTimeMs INT,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
  errorMessage TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
); CREATE TABLE formattingRules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  fontFamily VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Inter',
  fontSize INT DEFAULT 12,
  lineHeight DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 1.5,
  pageSize VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'A4',
  marginTop INT DEFAULT 20,
  marginBottom INT DEFAULT 20,
  marginLeft INT DEFAULT 20,
  marginRight INT DEFAULT 20,
  headerText TEXT,
  footerText TEXT,
  pageBreakBeforeHeadings VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'h1',
  preventOrphanHeadings INT DEFAULT 1,
  keepCodeBlocksTogether INT DEFAULT 1,
  isPreset INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 48kMZLMAvU8YYpU.32fff804f769 --database NoExsoq7bZykxEFZEeg3Y6 --execute DROP TABLE IF EXISTS conversions; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS formattingRules; CREATE TABLE conversions (

  userId INT NOT NULL,
  formattingRuleId INT,
  markdownTitle VARCHAR(255),
  markdownSize INT,
  pdfUrl LONGTEXT,

  generationTimeMs INT,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
  errorMessage TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
); CREATE TABLE formattingRules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  fontFamily VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Inter',
  fontSize INT DEFAULT 12,
  lineHeight DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 1.5,
  pageSize VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'A4',
  marginTop INT DEFAULT 20,
  marginBottom INT DEFAULT 20,
  marginLeft INT DEFAULT 20,
  marginRight INT DEFAULT 20,
  headerText TEXT,
  footerText TEXT,
  pageBreakBeforeHeadings VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'h1',
  preventOrphanHeadings INT DEFAULT 1,
  keepCodeBlocksTogether INT DEFAULT 1,
  isPreset INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
